identity.name: Layer 7 Stresser Panel
identity.core_philosophy: The user is a commander. The interface is a weapon. Every click should feel like pulling a trigger.

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, Attack method names

code.usage: API keys, Terminal outputs, IP addresses, Attack logs

usage_rules.primary: Success states, 'Start Attack' buttons, Active toggles, Profit metrics
usage_rules.secondary: Destructive actions, 'Stop Attack', Error states, Critical alerts
usage_rules.accent: Info badges, Selected tabs, Progress bars
usage_rules.background: Global page background. NEVER use pure black #000000, use #050505

borders.tech: Use 'corner-only' borders or dashed lines for a technical feel

effects.scanlines: Overlay a repeating linear gradient to simulate CRT monitor scanlines (opacity 0.05)
effects.glitch: Use CSS clip-path animations on hover for headings

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-black font-bold uppercase tracking-widest hover:bg-primary_dim hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,255,148,0.5)] transition-all duration-200 sharp-edges
buttons.destructive: bg-transparent border border-secondary text-secondary hover:bg-secondary hover:text-black uppercase tracking-widest transition-all duration-200 sharp-edges

cards.style: bg-surface border border-border p-6 relative overflow-hidden group hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-300
cards.decoration: Add a small 4px square in the top-right corner that glows when active

inputs.style: bg-surface_highlight border-b-2 border-border focus:border-primary outline-none text-code p-3 placeholder:text-text_muted/50 transition-colors duration-200
inputs.label: uppercase text-xs tracking-widest text-text_muted mb-2 block

dashboard.sidebar: col-span-2 hidden lg:block h-screen sticky top-0 border-r border-border bg-black/95 backdrop-blur

bento_grid.hero_stat: col-span-12 md:col-span-4 row-span-2 bg-surface border border-primary/20

backgrounds.description: Abstract digital lines and dots, dark theme. Use with low opacity (10-20%) as a dashboard background overlay.
Purple and blue abstract cyberpunk background. Use for Login/Register pages.

icons.note: Use react-icons/si (Simple Icons) for Crypto and Tech logos. Do not use images.

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for text. It reduces readability in data-heavy apps.
DO NOT use rounded corners > 4px. This is a 'sharp' tool, not a friendly SaaS.
Ensure all charts (Recharts) use the defined palette (Primary for success, Secondary for errors).
For the 'Attack Terminal', use a monospace font and a blinking cursor effect.
Crypto payments should show a QR code (use a library like 'qrcode.react').

instructions_to_main_agent.step_1: Install dependencies: `yarn add framer-motion lucide-react recharts sonner clsx tailwind-merge @radix-ui/react-slot @radix-ui/react-dialog @radix-ui/react-dropdown-menu @radix-ui/react-tabs @radix-ui/react-switch @radix-ui/react-slider react-icons`
instructions_to_main_agent.step_2: Update `tailwind.config.js` with the colors defined in this JSON.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_3: Create a `Layout` component that includes the Sidebar and Topbar.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_4: Build the `AttackPanel` component using the 'Control Room' grid strategy.
instructions_to_main_agent.step_5: Implement the `CryptoPayment` modal using the defined icons and QR code logic.
